main.name: Jacques van der Westhuizen
main.description: Cloud Native Development, AWS Machine Learning, Software Development
main.bio: Hello! The Name is Jacques! I've been working with computers and code for over 5 years now. I am a aspiring freelance software developer student working on projects in all kinds of career paths to add to my portfolio for potential employers to see. I have been working loads of python programming projects covering intermediate programming techniques such as object oriented programming and data structures and algorithms. I'm always curious when it come to implementing new platforms in businesses and the collaboration of multiple business platforms to achieve a certain objective. I have also worked with some platforms such as - Snowflake - DataRobot - TigerGraph - Knime Data Analytics. I focus to skill up on industry trend IT platforms and techniques to stay up to date when approaching a project and challenge's faced by large companies.

testimonials.text: Jacques's work is exquisite, more than what I expected......Best service in a professional manner
Can't Reconmend this guy enough, well organised and amazing communication skills. Never before have I encountered a more professional individual.

Of all the previous consultants I have recruited before, Jacques has stood out as a unique individual......Vast Leadership potential and the burning desire to succeed, with a Personality complimenting his qualities.
